transcript: if you hate receiving voice memos as much as I do here's how I respond to people when they send them I say it's loud I'm at XYZ please send bullets so I can get back to you more quickly I give a reason and then I also give a reason that benefits them for sending me bullets and then that way you don't have to spend six minutes listening to someone rant when they really just need to ask you what do you want to have for dinner tonight
